item.title: Content Security Policy
item.itunes:author: Julien Vehent, Christoph Kerschbaumer, Frederik Braun and Dylan Hardison
item.itunes:summary: In this first episode, we talk about Content Security Policy, or CSP, with Christoph Kerschbaumer, Frederik Braun and Dylan Hardison. We cover both the history and future of CSP, and various issues we have learned while implementing it on our own sites and services.
